glsa.title: wpa_supplicant: Buffer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: wpa_supplicant contains a buffer overflow that could lead to a Denial of Service.

background.p: wpa_supplicant is a WPA Supplicant with support for WPA and WPA2 (IEEE 802.11i / RSN).

description.p: wpa_supplicant contains a possible buffer overflow due to the lacking validation of received EAPOL-Key frames.

impact.p: An attacker could cause the crash of wpa_supplicant using a specially crafted packet.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All wpa_supplicant users should upgrade to the latest version:
